Articles.Content:
Last night I was pounding out some contracts and noticed some newer ones, such as launching satellites into Kerbin/Munar orbit, setting up space stations on the Mun and Minmus, etc.

Could this be a possible sign of Squad implementing more mods such as RemoteTech and TAC Life Support into the game in the near future?

ALL HAIL KSP!

Last night I was pounding out some contracts and noticed some newer ones, such as launching satellites into Kerbin/Munar orbit, setting up space stations on the Mun and Minmus, etc.

Could this be a possible sign of Squad implementing more mods such as RemoteTech and TAC Life Support into the game in the near future?

ALL HAIL KSP!

Yes, FinePrint was added to the game. Squad said at some point that life support would be a big "maybe" and IF they implement it, it would be a toggleable option (I'm guessing in the difficulty panel).
